column5: MSc Accounting and Financeis for graduates with first degrees in accounting, finance, management, economics and other social science disciplines, including sociology and political science. Graduates with science and mathematical background are also welcome to apply.The programme is designed to provide a career entry opportunity for full-time students as well as a career development opportunity for accountants, auditors, practicing managers, business consultants and finance experts from various backgrounds, to enhance and develop their accounting and finance skills.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
